movies.Title: Star Trek: Prodigy
movies.Actors: Bonnie Gordon, Brett Gray, Ella Purnell
movies.Plot: A group of teenagers steal a derelict Starfleet vessel and use it to explore the galaxy.

movies.Title: Star Trek: Lower Decks
movies.Actors: Tawny Newsome, Jack Quaid, NoÃ«l Wells
movies.Plot: The support crew serving on one of Starfleet's least important ships, the U.S.S. Cerritos, have to keep up with their duties, often while the ship is being rocked by a multitude of sci-fi anomalies.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 2 wins & 10 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Picard
movies.Writer: Kirsten Beyer, Michael Chabon, Akiva Goldsman
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, Alison Pill, Isa Briones
movies.Plot: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard (Sir Patrick Stewart) in the next chapter of his life.
movies.Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. 7 wins & 15 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Short Treks
movies.Writer: Alex Kurtzman, Bryan Fuller, Michael Chabon
movies.Actors: Anson Mount, Rebecca Romijn, Ethan Peck
movies.Plot: A series of stand-alone short films featuring characters and storylines from Star Trek: Discovery (2017).
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 1 win & 4 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Discovery
movies.Actors: Sonequa Martin-Green, Doug Jones, Anthony Rapp
movies.Plot: Ten years before Kirk, Spock, and the Enterprise, the USS Discovery discovers new worlds and lifeforms as one Starfleet officer learns to understand all things alien.
movies.Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. 18 wins & 64 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek Beyond
movies.Writer: Simon Pegg, Doug Jung, Gene Roddenberry
movies.Actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban
movies.Plot: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.
movies.Country: United States, China, United Arab Emirates, Canada
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 3 wins & 29 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek Into Darkness
movies.Writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, Damon Lindelof
movies.Actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Zoe Saldana
movies.Plot: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 7 wins & 59 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek
movies.Writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, Gene Roddenberry
movies.Actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Simon Pegg
movies.Plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.Title: Star Trek: Nemesis
movies.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, John Logan, Rick Berman
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
movies.Plot: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth

movies.Title: Star Trek: Insurrection
movies.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Michael Piller
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
movies.Plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

movies.Title: Star Trek: First Contact
movies.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
movies.Plot: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 8 wins & 21 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Generations
movies.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Ronald D. Moore
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell
movies.Plot: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

movies.Title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
movies.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Leonard Nimoy, Lawrence Konner
movies.Actors: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
movies.Plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 2 wins & 9 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Enterprise
movies.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
movies.Plot: A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.
movies.Awards: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. 14 wins & 50 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Voyager
movies.Writer: Rick Berman, Michael Piller, Jeri Taylor
movies.Actors: Kate Mulgrew, Robert Beltran, Roxann Dawson
movies.Plot: Pulled to the far side of the galaxy, where the Federation is seventy-five years away at maximum warp speed, a Starfleet ship must cooperate with Maquis rebels to find a way home.
movies.Awards: Won 7 Primetime Emmys. 33 wins & 84 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
movies.Actors: Avery Brooks, Rene Auberjonois, Cirroc Lofton
movies.Plot: In the vicinity of the liberated planet of Bajor, the Federation space station Deep Space Nine guards the opening of a stable wormhole to the far side of the galaxy.
movies.Awards: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. 59 wins & 116 nominations total

movies.Title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
movies.Actors: Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes
movies.Plot: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's five-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers set off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on their own mission to go where no one has gone before.
movies.Awards: Won 18 Primetime Emmys. 36 wins & 61 nominations total
